text: Sir Tomasi Puapua (born 10 September 1938) is a Tuvaluan politician. He was the Prime Minister of Tuvalu from 1981 to 1989 and then Governor-General of Tuvalu from 1998 to 2003. In 1998, he was made a Knight Commander of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire (KBE) for services to medicine, politics and the community. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Tuvalu Category:Governors-General of Tuvalu
title: Tomasi Puapua
